Description:
Where Luxury, Tranquillity and Lifestyle Meet - This is Living
This stunning near new home has been built to exacting standards with quality, class and sophistication in mind. Positioned to perfection on a gorgeous 1 and a 1/4 acre allotment the home itself features 3 large bedrooms, the master a king size retreat with massive en suite, stunning free standing bath and separate shower. The open plan kitchen, meals living area is exquisite and features electric induction cooktop, duel oven, dishwasher and butler's pantry. Everywhere looks out onto something here and the peaceful tranquillity these magnificent grounds have to offer are simply stunning with regular visits from our native wildlife including kangaroos, koalas, magnificent birdlife and even the resident echidna. Outside incorporates a sensational outdoor alfresco area overlooking the gorgeous garden surrounds and beautiful natural flora and fauna. Features include a 5.1kw solar electricity system (approx. 26 panels), central heating and refrigerated cooling & ducted vacuuming throughout, double carport and massive 9x12 garage with home office and man cave including pot belly, shower and toilet - the ideal space to entertain with family and friends. Including American oak flooring, 45,000 litre water tank, town water, NBN and surround sound both inside and out this is a home you'll never want to leave. Situated just 5 mins from the Creswick town centre and 20 minutes from the Ballarat CBD this fringe property is positioned to perfection and a real retreat for those looking for peace and tranquillity yet coupled together with modern day conveniences one has come to expect. A real surprise package from front to back, both inside and out - this home is sure to impress so call now to book your private viewing today.
Insights: 4399 Creswick-Newstead Road, Broomfield VIC 3364 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Country Living
Designed with style and elegance, this exceptional split level home has been fashioned to capitalise on its orientation. Filled with natural light, the layout encompasses an outstanding family floor plan along with an undercover alfresco entertaining area with lush, private gardens as well as a fenced area surrounding the property to keep a pony or other grazing animals.
The first thing you notice on entering this 2568m2 allotment is the manicured gardens, the two gated entries which completes a secure front yard and the two double lock up garages, complete with two wide (5.1Mtr) remote electric roller doors. In immaculate condition with quality fittings and finishes, this home has been finished with a stunning solid Jarrah double entry door which takes you through to the homes easy palette and exceptional updated fit out. The kitchen and both bathrooms have been renovated to modern taste and facilities with stainless steel appliances and new bench tops including a Franke Fragranite Onyx double sink.
With features still evident from its construction era, this double brick downstairs / brick veneer upstairs home has an open design which incorporates the timber & brick dining area, the sun drenched rumpus or second living area and cosy formal lounge. Adding a further place to entertain is the large undercover alfresco zone to the rear, which has been cleverly designed as a space to relax as you watch the kids play in the garden, whilst also providing easy connection with the inside.
All bedrooms have floor to ceiling mirrored robes and large panoramic windows, while the downstairs front windows are 8mm laminated glass. All windows (except the rumpus room) are also mirror tinted for privacy and improved year round temperature control. A study is also available downstairs as an extension of the lounge, which is ideally located not to miss out on all the action of the family activities. Upstairs is designed with children in mind, with three further bedrooms, an up-landing retreat or third living area with an updated family bathroom.
The Garage comprises of two double car spaces with Attic storage and has power points installed in several places including the built in workshop. The front of the garage has two large electric roller doors and the rear has two single manual roller doors to allow access to the rear of the property. There is also a secure concrete parking space next to the garage that is ideal for a boat or caravan that is made private via Colourbond gates.
Outdoors provides not only a low maintenance yard, concrete driveways, a garden shed, an inbuilt wood fired pizza oven and a free standing storage shed for those extra bits and pieces.
Positioned North of the township, just minutes from the Creswick North Primary School, this property will provide the lifestyle, the space and a high level of accommodation for the entire family.
Further features include: split systems, panelled heater, NBN Fixed Wireless, Cat 5 PC Network wiring back to central location, security doors and alarm system, this property is truly a fabulous family friendly property, which must be viewed to appreciate its worth.

Description:
Family Entertainer On Approx. 9 Acres
The latest designer element of family homes is the added feature of an outdoor kitchen. Built approx. 10 years ago, but way ahead of its times, this large four bedroom home, has included just that. With a flexible pavilion included to the rear of this sprawling home, this property is all about entertaining!
A generous elevated deck is embedded with a salt water pool, a massive alfresco room is designed with an outdoor kitchen and bathroom, while clears, lighting options and mountains of room to entertain, exercise or dine, will provide the ultimate place to entertain family and friends. Connection to the vast lawns and open spaces will encourage you to add some plantings and landscaping ideas, while the clean open slate will not compromise your design or workings.
Step inside, and be blown away by the sheer size of this home. Large bay windows create an elegant feature to both the formal lounge and the casual dining zone, while the galley style kitchen with 900mm Smeg stainless steel cooker and range hood along with handy butlers pantry are the stand out features of the room.
The master suite is a commodious place to rest in style with a double vanity ensuite, large oval relaxing spa with a separate toilet and generous shower providing extra room and privacy features. Three further rooms offer built in robes, while a study is also available for floor plan flexibility.
Serviced by a stylish contemporary bathroom, a powder room and a generous laundry (with ample storage), this home with three individual living zones would certainly provide excellent facilities for blended families or ideal for larger families with long term guests. With full return verandas to the front and a complete blank canvas to work with, this nine acre property is just minutes from the buzzing township of Creswick on the Clunes side, with land to utilize for whatever you desire.
For further information and to arrange a private inspection, please contact our agent ASAP!

Description:
RARE OPPORTUNITY
Phone enquiry code for this property: 3222
A rare opportunity in this price range to own a property in tightly-held Blampied, so close to Daylesford on over 5 peaceful acres.
Located just eight minutes from Daylesford and thirty minutes to Ballarat and Ballan (express trains direct into Southern Cross Station in less than an hour), this tranquil property offers a secluded and relaxing setting. Unwind surrounded by the native wildlife!
The property has an open-plan lounge, dining and kitchen area with a wood heater and reverse-cycle A/C. The kitchen is spacious, has heaps of storage and includes a new Bosch dishwasher. The master bedroom is spacious and large enough for a king-size bed.
Explore outside and you'll discover 2 dams, the larger one is approximately 0.7 acres in area, has its own island and is big enough to kayak around! Try your luck catching yabbies and probably fish too. The large dam provides water for the gardens and toilet whilst there are two 20,000 litre water tanks to supply the house. You'll also find established apple and other fruit trees. There is workshop space in the garage, a wood shed and an additional garden shed. The property is connected to the electricity grid, telephone and has high-speed NBN Wireless.
Don't miss out! Inspections by appointment only.
Phone enquiry code for this property: 3222

Description:
EXQUISITE FAMILY ENTERTAINER ON 6.5 ACRES
Immaculately presented on approx 6.5 acres at Kingston, north of Creswick, this delightful home features 4 large bedrooms plus a study, massive rumpus room and a spacious open plan kitchen/meals/ family area. Four bedrooms have built-in robes with the master being a huge room with large walk-in robe, ensuite with spa bath and a separate toilet. Other features include slab heating, reverse cycle air-conditioners, central vacuum system and high ceilings with ornate cornice.
An extensive alfresco area at the rear is fully enclosed and the best you could wish for! The gardens are very well landscaped with established trees and lovely wide views - you can watch the sunset out the front to the west.
There is an oversized double garage with built-in storage cupboards plus other sheds 15m x 7m and 4m x 7m both have power and concrete floors. The Tennis court is asphalted and fenced and town water is connected.
The land is divided into 3 paddocks plus the house yard, 2 water tanks (approx 45,000 litres) plus a bore that just needs a pump system installed if you want to water all year round.
Another advantage is the power saving with 20 Solar Panels and a 5KW system plus 3 phase power. This master built home and indeed the whole property is a delight to inspect!

Description:
Fantastic Renovated Family Home With Ever So Much Space
Found in a quiet street is this delightfully renovated home. Beautifully presented the abode displays a warm colour scheme, young floor coverings and polished jarrah boards. The large living room grants views over countryside, while the dwelling is only 2 minutes to the hub of town. Any chef would be pleased to work in such a kitchen with 900mm oven, stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and stone bench tops. A separate from the new bathroom is a powder room with twin vanity for family convenience. A decking area overlooks a huge rear yard of the quarter acre property. Shedding is ample with a tandem carport and separate garage.

Large undercover entertainment area spans the complete back of the home, ideal for the family gatherings.
Bring the groceries straight in undercover for the end to end carport that adjoins the side of the home.
Ideal for the busy family, with the low maintenance front and rear gardens, and
located on the Ballarat side of Creswick, an easy commute into Ballarat for work.
Nothing to do, move straight in and enjoy this lovely home.

Picturesque Lifestyle On The Edge Of Town
This wondrous home is nestled on the prettiest half acre allotment you will see. The abode has great warmth and character with cathedral ceilings, large fire place and lovely views from every window. The renovated kitchen looks out to the all seasons area, where entertaining all year round can happen. There are paths that lead to garden beds, vegie garden, fruit trees, gazebo and multiple private and serene sitting areas. There is fantastic shedding throughout the property. A country lifestyle is on offer while only being three minutes to the hub of town and 20 minutes to Daylesford.

Description:
For First Home Buyers Or Investors This Is For You
With a little bit of individuality, this property offers a charming three bedroom home with three varying roof lines, a good size corner allotment and the convenience to access the town within minutes, this home would certainly work for new families, investors or those looking at winding down.
With vehicle accessibility from Jory Street and front entrance from Williams Street, this property also offers a workshop or tool shed. With a number established shrubs and trees including: Nashi pears and almonds, this property also offers the opportunity to add your own summer style to the garden with colourbond and wire fencing to the perimeter.
Internally the kitchen, meals and living room (combustion heater plus split system) are all placed to one side, which provides a perfect area to entertain family or friends, while a second living area or sitting room (with further combustion heater) is stationed next to the three bedrooms and the family bathroom. The kitchen has been updated with new white cabinetry encompassing the dining area, with superior stainless steel appliances providing further style to the cooking facilities. The family bathroom offers - white dado panelling that line the walls with a full size bath, shower and vanity, while instantaneous gas hot water keeps a continuous flow of hot water in the independent laundry which also houses the all important loo.
Complete with stain glass doors and timber like floating floors, this home also offers splashes of colour, cosy carpet and built in robes in the three good size bedrooms. This one will delight those empty nesters or be ideal as a little investor! Call today for further details.

Description:
Immaculate Inside & Out, Set On Approx. 3/4 Of An Acre
A signature garden, a massive outdoor deck, loads of character and mountains of room to roam. Set in the stunning district of Broomfield, just five minutes from Creswick and twenty minutes to Ballarat, this delightful property is filled with perfumes, colours and ever-changing colours.
Quite deceptive from the outside, this three bedroom home presents timber vaulted ceilings, exposed beams, leadlight windows ,dado lining and plush carpet, which melds perfectly together to offer a cosy home with room for growing families or just a serene retreat. The master suite is generous in size with walk in robe and capacious ensuite, while the two further bedrooms are serviced by a smart family bathroom and an exceptionally large laundry with loads of storage options.
The sunken formal living area is presented with an eclectic dÃ©cor and a splash of colour, while the dining zone and family area (with combustion heating) take in the views of the garden and panoramic views through the many windows and doors. The kitchen takes on a country theme with bespoke cabinetry, timber benchtops, metal splashbacks and a three point working triangle.
The trump card of this home is the huge timber deck to the rear, which provides, an a enough room for the entire community to gather, while also offering ample room for a casual BBQs or formal dinner under the stars.
A freestanding double garage provides roller door entry, while a high carport has been engineered to cover a caravan, boat or machinery. A freshly painted exterior blends perfectly with the garden surrounds, while a garden shed, wood shed ,and water tank compliment the home and outbuildings. Town water is also connected, with school bus pick up available just along Broomfield Rd and wildlife passing by for further visiting interest. This home can only be appreciated on inspection, therefore call our agent today for details.

Description:
Cute Cottage On Approx. 3 Acres
Be inspired by this gorgeous cottage positioned just a few minutes from the heart of Creswick. Its cute entrance arbour, cottage garden, lead light windows and the paved and decked veranda captures your attention right from the onset, while to the rear you will find 1.49 hectares of land separated into individual paddocks with loose boxes as well as provisions for horse enthusiasts and a small seasonal dam.
Town water, septic and tank water (new) will help maintain the five prolific raised vegetable garden beds, which will keep your kitchen fully stocked at little cost, while a double bay shed will cover additional vehicles and store your firewood. A single garage is also available with crown land almost surrounding the entire property which will ensure country views in their entirety for years to come
Two bedrooms, a sunroom and a generous kitchen are supplemented by a living area, family bathroom and a snug study nook which keeps all that dreaded paperwork neat and tidy. Highlights in the kitchen are the oxford blue feature wall along with contemporary floor tiles. Stainless steel appliances and granite bench tops gleam with the enormous amount of natural light that filters though the large colonial windows and door.
Cosy on its own, the formal lounge or living zone is warmed by a toasty combustion heater, which is surrounded by a decorative timber mantel along with a strategically placed split system for year round comfort. The ceilings in each room are characterized with timber lining boards blending perfectly with pendants and white wash palette, while dado boards add a little further character to the living room. The family bathroom has a stunning little French window that opens onto the walkway through to the cottage garden outdoors.
This is a home that will cover every aspect of good country living, while also providing proximity benefits to Creswick, Ballarat and beyond. A pleasure to advertise - call today!

Description:
Stunning Beauty Encased In Superb Bush Haven
Immaculately presented with rock walls, trimmed hedges and manicured gardens, this sweeping sandstone replica home is in top notch condition for families to enjoy. A full width veranda, a backdrop of majestic gums and the raised setting, creates an opulent location especially with five acres to play with right at your door.
Inside is just as impressive with large floor to ceiling windows playing an integral part of the homes dÃ©cor and floorplan. With light filling the home from every angle, this property with slate tiles and cosy carpet will surely delight those who are looking for a little class amongst the trees.
The kitchen is crafted with shaker style cabinetry and perfectly connected with the casual dining zone, family room, formal dining/lounge room and outdoor entertaining area. Draped in vines and artistically connected to the sunny side of the home, this alfresco area with water feature is ideal for barbecues along with the perfect place to sip a wine or two. Bedrooms 2 and 3 provide built in robes, while the master suite is five star luxury with a generous walk in robe and large corner spa. A study or 4th bedroom is also available for a little floorplan movement, or ideal for a home office with NBN available.
Fully insulated and constructed through the 90s, this home has been immaculately maintained with lush green lawns, beautiful established trees along with distant views across the land. A large dam with electric pump assists the gardens, while a 24 x 30 shed with three bays, concrete floors and power ensure any farm machinery or extra vehicles are covered and protected.
Situated in the popular Blampied locale, this property is just 10 minutes from Daylesford and 25 minutes from Ballarat, with many proximity advantages including a 1hr 30 minutes commute to Melbourne and 15 minutes to Creswick, and in close proximity to the popular Swiss Mountain Hotel or maze house for meals and coffee. Call for further details.

Description:
Heritage Style Home On 39 Fertile Acres
Introducing Quarry Hill, a beautiful historic property set on approx. 39 acres of gentle undulating hills and offering stunning views in every direction. Certified organic for the past 25 years, this property offers a once in a lifetime opportunity to acquire fertile soil, an abundant water supply and a private home and scenic setting for any number of rural pursuits (STCA).
Offering extensive water supplies with town water connected to the home, a spring fed well, stock and domestic bore plus an old spring fed quarry hole which in the past has been used to irrigate the property. Outdoors also provides good fencing, three paddocks with arable volcanic soil, a quality shearing shed with power, a multi-purpose machinery shed of approx. 542m2 also with power and part concrete floor and a double garage for vehicle cover.
The Californian bungalow home offers three bedrooms (one of which is currently utilized as an additional living room), a basic country style kitchen, a two sided veranda with original features along with two toilets and an updated bathroom. The main living room is styled with the beauty of rich timber lined walls with picture rails and high ceilings adding a slight grandeur to the room, while the family area and kitchen offers dado lining boards along with period lighting for that fine-looking authenticity.
With a sealed road frontage along with further access via Birchs Creek Road, this property is virtually a large square shaped allotment in the highly regarded area of Kingston.
Located approx. 20 minutes from Ballarat, 15 minutes drive to Daylesford, 10 minutes to Creswick and just moments from the Kingston Township. This opportunity is very rare and would suit any rural pursuit (STCA).

Description:
Historic Former Moorookyle School Site
If it's a piece of history you're after then look no further than this charming cottage on the former Moorookyle School site.
Enjoy the easy care garden, with established trees, embrace the panoramic views of Mt Moorookyle and Mt Kooroocheang and surrounding farming land on rich volcanic soil.
Property Features include:
* 2 bedroom cottage
* Floating timber flooring
* Kent wood heater
* Sunroom/porch
* Bore water
* Single garage & carport
* Sundry shedding/woodshed
Ideally located on approx. 1/2 acre just out of Smeaton, 25 minutes to Daylesford or Ballarat, and only 15 minutes to Clunes and Creswick
